Title: More Palestinians Detained in West Bank As Illegal Settlers Attack Farmers
Description: Islam Times - Six more Palestinians were arrested by Israeli forces in military raids in the West Bank on Thursday.

Title: Iran Pledges Strong Retaliation After Israeli Attack Violates Sovereignty
Description: Islam Times - A high-ranking commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) warned that Iran will 'definitely' respond to Israel, making the regime regret its latest act of aggression against the country.

Title: Israel 'Committing War Crimes' by Forcibly Displacing 1.9 Million Palestinians: HRW
Description: Islam Times - Human Rights Watch (HRW) on Thursday accused Israel of committing war crimes and crimes against humanity through the forced displacement of nearly 1.9 million Palestinians amid its ongoing genocidal war in Gaza.

Title: French Prosecutors Seek Prison Term, Election Ban for Le Pen
Description: Islam Times - French prosecutors have asked a judge to slap former National Rally party leader Marine Le Pen with a five-year prison term and a ban from running for public office in an embezzlement case.

Title: South Korea to Support Ukraine in Response to Russia-North Korea Alliance: President
Description: Islam Times - South Korea is ready to boost military assistance to Ukraine alongside its allies if Russia and North Korea continue their collaboration, President Yoon Suk Yeol said.

Title: US Appeals Court Reverses $1.68 Billion Judgment against Iran's Central Bank
Description: Islam Times - A US appeals court on Wednesday overturned a $1.68 billion judgment against Iran’s Central Bank.

Title: Iran: Ball in EU/E3 Court, To Negotiate Based on Inalienable Rights
Description: Islam Times - Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi confirmed that Tehran is ready to hold nuclear negotiations with the EU troika based on its interest and rights but not under pressure and intimidation.

Title: UNSC Condemns Targeted Attacks on UNIFIL amid Escalating 'Israeli' Actions in Lebanon
Description: Islam Times - The United Nations Security Council [UNSC] has condemned recent assaults on the UN peacekeeping mission in Lebanon, citing deliberate targeting of UN bases by 'Israeli' occupation forces.

Title: CIA Official Arrested for Leaking Secret Docs on 'Israel'
Description: Islam Times - The FBI has arrested a CIA official accused of leaking classified documents on 'Israel’s preparations for a strike against Iran, according to reports.

Title: Pezeshkian: Global Consensus Grows on Iran’s Commitment to Peace and Security
Description: Islam Times - Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian stated that the international community increasingly recognizes Iran's dedication to peace and security, affirming that the country's nuclear program is entirely peaceful.

Title: Sayyed Al-Houthi Condemns US Support for ’Israeli’ Atrocities, Urges Continued Resistance in West Asia
Description: Islam Times - The leader of Yemen's Ansarullah resistance movement, Sayyed Abdul-Malik al-Houthi, condemned the United States for its complicity in 'Israeli' atrocities in Gaza and Lebanon, stating that American-made bombs and munitions are fueling wars of extermination across West Asia.

Title: UN Report: 'Israel’s' Gaza Actions Consistent with Genocide
Description: Islam Times - A UN special committee has declared that 'Israel's' tactics in Gaza align with 'genocide,' citing the use of starvation as a weapon of war. The committee's Thursday report details atrocities by 'Israel' since the onset of its ongoing offensive on Gaza in October 2023, covering actions up to July 2024.

Title: Twin 'Israeli' Airstrikes Hit Syrian Capital and Suburb, Leaving Over a Dozen Martyred
Description: Islam Times - At least fifteen people have been martyred in 'Israeli' airstrikes on areas around Damascus, with 'Israeli' aircraft targeting positions in both western Damascus and its surrounding countryside.

Title: IRGC: Resistance Front to Avenge Any Aggression, Deliver Painful Blows to Enemies
Description: Islam Times - The chief commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps [IRGC] Major General Hossein Salami has warned that the resistance front will avenge any 'Israeli' aggression, adding that the enemies of Islam will receive 'painful' blows in case of a broader conflict with Muslims.

Title: IAEA's Grossi Meets with Araqchi in Tehran
Description: Islam Times - Director-General of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), Rafael Grossi, met with Abbas Araghchi, Foreign Minister of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on Thursday during his visit to Tehran, where the two engaged in talks.

Title: Violence in Amsterdam Anti-Semitism or Anti-Zionism?
Description: Islam Times - Israeli football fans have clashed with pro-Palestinian protesters on November 8, before and after a Europa League football match between their team Maccabi Tel Aviv and Ajax in Amsterdam.

Title: Thousands Flee As Typhoon Usagi Hits North of Philippines
Description: Islam Times - Typhoon Usagi slammed into the Philippines’ already disaster-ravaged north on Thursday, as authorities rushed to evacuate thousands of people from coastal areas.

Title: BRICS Offered Turkey Partner Country Status, Turkish Trade Minister Says
Description: Islam Times - Turkey was offered partner country status by the BRICS group of nations, Trade Minister Omer Bolat said, as Ankara continues what it calls its efforts to balance its Eastern and Western ties.

Title: Republicans Win 218 US House Seats, Giving Donald Trump, Party Control of Government
Description: Islam Times - Republicans have won enough seats to control the US House, completing the party’s sweep into power and securing their hold on US government alongside US President-elect Donald Trump.

Title: US Views Russia as Present-Day Threat, Trump May Prioritize Containing China: Lavrov
Description: Islam Times - Containing China will be a priority task for the United States under Donald Trump, while Washington views Russia as a 'present-day threat,' Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov said.

Title: Explosions Kill 1 Man outside Brazil’s Supreme Court, Force Justices to Evacuate
Description: Islam Times - Two explosions outside Brazil’s Supreme Court on Wednesday killed a man and forced the justices and staff to evacuate the building in the capital of Brasilia.

Title: WB Annexation Remarks Another Sign of Israel’s Racist, Expansionist Nature: Iran
Description: Islam Times - Iran denounced an Israeli cabinet minister’s statement regarding the annexation of the West Bank, describing it as yet another sign of the Tel Aviv regime’s racist and expansionist nature.

Title: Hezbollah SG Sheikh Naim Qassem’s Letter to the Islamic Resistance Mujahidin
Description: Islam Times - A letter from Hezbollah’s Secretary General Sheikh Naim Qassem to the Mujahidin of the Islamic Resistance

Title: Hezbollah Pounds Israel’s Military Headquarters in Tel Aviv
Description: Islam Times - Lebanon’s resistance movement Hezbollah has for the first time attacked the headquarters of Israel’s military in Tel Aviv.
